content.rendered:
ROCKARMOR PREMIUM SERIES BULLBAR TO SUIT TOYOTA HILUX (2015 – 2019)

Rockarmor Premium Series bullbar to suit Toyota Hilux (2015 – 2019) available for order now through Automax 4×4! Order online, come in & see us or give us a call on (02) 6699 2744 for a quote!

Designed & tested in Australia, Rockarmor’s Elite steel Bull bar provides your vehicle with the ultimate in front end protection. Making sure air flow to the engine is maintained, the Rockarmor bull bar is manufactured with a heavy duty 63mm diameter cross bar which protects the full front of the vehicle against any potential animal strikes that may harm areas like your head lights, front grill and engine components.  Designed to be functional for vehicles that drive both on road & off road, the Elite Bull bar has been engineered to store vital accessories such as a Winch, UHF Antenna, safety flags, driving lights plus allowance of a high lift jack recovery.

The Elite bull bar comes complete with L.E.D fog lights, L.E.D indicators, under body stone guards and is finished with a high quality powder coat that will withstand Australia’s harsh weather conditions. 100% ADR Compliant, and Air Bag approved, Rockarmor’s Elite bull bar is put through a strict set of tests that gives you confidence your vehicle will be protected at all times.

Features include:

  • 63mm cross tubing
  • LED fog lights
  • LED parked and indicator lights
  • Winch compatible
  • Airbag compatible
  • Underbody skid plate protection
  • Twin antenna & driving light mounts

2015 – 2017: Full Bumper Replacement (No Grille Cut Required)

2018 – 2019: Full Bumper Replacement (Grille Cut Required)

PLEASE NOTE: Depending on stock & availability, the current wait time for this product is approx. 30 – 90 days from date of order. 

CLICK HERE to view the range of products available for your Toyota Hilux!
Follow us on Instagram and Facebook to keep up to date with what’s going on in our workshop!
